resources.string: The main objective of Not Sorry is to get your two pieces to your home on the board. To do this, a player on their turn will draw a card, and decide which of their pieces to move. You need a 1 or 2 in order to leave start. The NPC pieces will move a piece back to the start if they land on someone, or if that other piece lands on them. 2 points are needed to win.
